Tibia.Objects.Client

Tibia.Objects.Client Class Reference

Represents a single Tibia Client. Contains wrapper methods for memory, packet sending, battlelist, and slots. Also contains any "helper methods" that automate tasks, such as making a rune. More...

Detailed Description

Represents a single Tibia Client. Contains wrapper methods for memory, packet sending, battlelist, and slots. Also contains any "helper methods" that automate tasks, such as making a rune.

bool Tibia.Objects.Client.makeRune ( Rune  rune  ) 

Make a rune. Drags a blank to the right hand, casts the words, and moved the new rune back. TODO add option to change the hand and a method to make sure the hand is free. TODO add option to check for soul points.

Parameters:
rune The rune to make.
Returns:
True if everything went well, false if no blank was found or part or all of the process failed
